scripts.removedir: rm -rf dist/styles && rm -rf dist/scripts && rm -f dist/index.php
scripts.postcss: postcss -c postcss.json -i src/styles/main.css | exorcist dist/styles/main.min.css.map > dist/styles/main.min.css
scripts.browserify: browserify -e src/scripts/main.js -d -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --only src/scripts ] | exorcist dist/scripts/main.js.map > dist/scripts/main.js
scripts.uglify: uglifyjs dist/scripts/main.js --screw-ie8 -m -c -o dist/scripts/main.min.js --source-map dist/scripts/main.min.js.map --source-map-url main.min.js.map --in-source-map dist/scripts/main.js.map
scripts.build:scripts: npm run browserify && npm run uglify
scripts.build:all: npm run removedir && npm run makedir && npm run build:styles && npm run build:scripts
scripts.watch:all: npm run build:all && parallelshell 'npm run serve' 'npm run watch:styles' 'npm run watch:scripts'
scripts.watch:all:dev: npm run build:all && parallelshell 'npm run serve:dev' 'npm run watch:styles' 'npm run watch:scripts'
